word

Class WordManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • word.WordManager

  • public class WordManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: WordManager

    Description: class which reads the words from a text file and saves them in a linked list in order to extract them at the instantiation of a new StringWord.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Diana Sighinolfi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WordManager()
      Constructor without parameters which instantiates a new word manager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String extractWord()
      Method which extracts a word from the linked list WordList.
      int getLevel()
      Gets the current level of game.
      void increaseLevel()
      Method which increase the current level of game.
      void LoadWords()
      Method which adds the word from the file who refers to the current level to the WordList in order to be used in StringWord class.
      void readFile(java.io.FileReader freader)
      Method which reads the file and append each character in a string of the array Words.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WordManager

        public WordManager()
        Constructor without parameters which instantiates a new word manager.

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        public void readFile(java.io.FileReader freader)
        Method which reads the file and append each character in a string of the array Words.
        Parameters:
        freader - the file reader
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the txt file is't in the same directory of this class
        java.io.IOException - if an error in reading the file occurred

      • LoadWords

        public void LoadWords()
        Method which adds the word from the file who refers to the current level to the WordList in order to be used in StringWord class.

      • increaseLevel

        public void increaseLevel()
        Method which increase the current level of game. If the player finishes the third level, the game starts again from the first one.

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Gets the current level of game.
        Returns:
        the current level

      • extractWord

        public java.lang.String extractWord()
        Method which extracts a word from the linked list WordList.
        Returns:
        the word extracted
